A pickaxe made from the rare underwater material called hydrilium.

The Hydrilium pickaxe item is a crafted item.

Requirement

  • At least Mining lvl. 45.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

+13% Work efficiency While doing Mining.

+16% Work efficiency While doing Mining.
+25% Chest finding While doing Mining.
+1% Double action While doing Mining.
+3% Double rewards While doing Mining.
+19% Find gems While doing Mining.

+20% Work efficiency While doing Mining.
+40% Chest finding While doing Mining.
+2% Double action While doing Mining.
+6% Double rewards While doing Mining.
+30% Find gems While doing Mining.

+26% Work efficiency While doing Mining.
+45% Chest finding While doing Mining.
+4% Double action While doing Mining.
+9% Double rewards While doing Mining.
+34% Find gems While doing Mining.

+32% Work efficiency While doing Mining.
+48% Chest finding While doing Mining.
+7% Double action While doing Mining.
+12% Double rewards While doing Mining.
+36% Find gems While doing Mining.

+40% Work efficiency While doing Mining.
+51% Chest finding While doing Mining.
+16% Double action While doing Mining.
+15% Double rewards While doing Mining.
+38% Find gems While doing Mining.

Uses

Job Boards

Hydrilium pickaxe can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Vastalume job board Vastalume 5 +2  Syrenthia Faction Reputation
